## cilium bpf vtep delete

Delete vtep entries

### Synopsis

Delete vtep entries using vtep CIDR.


```
cilium bpf vtep delete [flags]
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help   help for delete
```

```
      --config string   Config file (default is $HOME/.cilium.yaml)
  -D, --debug           Enable debug messages
```
